Leni

Korean: 레니

Country:

South Korea

Blood type:
Group (2018-present):
Lower

Introduction

Leni is an independent South Korean singer-songwriter and producer. On July 12, 2018, Leni debuted as a member of the duo Lower alongside Luli Lee. On February 21, 2019, Leni made her debut as a solo artist and released her first digital single, "City Lights".

Jul 12, 2018

active
